page.title: 05Saturday Activity
page.content: AUTOBIOGRAPHY My Saturday by Richard Gill, aged 10 On Saturday I go {fishing }at Hollywater. Sometimes I use a float and also a spinner but recently I used snails as bait. I love watching {fresh water {shrimps}but recently I caught a 3/4lb cannibal{trout}on a spinner-that was in the morning.I do not care if I do not catch anything because it is so peaceful and nobody is down there making a noise so you can hear the birds singing. Sometimes you can see {minnows}just swimming along in shoals- you can sit for hours just watching.If you drop a net in it will come up with minnows in it.When I go down with Richard Charles he brings his keep net Sometimes we go together for a whole day and we collect{snails}for his pond. Then we go home on our bikes.
